mapper.select: SELECT A.NO as NO, A.TITLE as TITLE, A.CONTENT as CONTEST, A.USE_YN as USER_YN, A.USER_ID as USER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.INSERT_DATE, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi') as INSERT_DATE FROM TBOARD A WHERE A.USE_YN='1'
SELECT A.NO as NO, A.TITLE as TITLE, A.CONTENT as CONTEST, A.USER_ID as USER_ID FROM TBOARD A WHERE A.NO=#{no}

SELECT A.NO as NO, A.RECONTENT as RECONTENT, A.USER_ID as USER_ID, A.RE_YN as RE_YN, TO_CHAR(A.INSERT_DATE, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi') as INSERT_DATE, A.RE_NO as RE_NO FROM TREPLY A WHERE A.NO=#{no} AND A.RE_YN='1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TREPLY (NO, RECONTENT, USER_ID, RE_NO ) VALUES (#{no}, #{recontent}, #{userId}, TREPLY_RE_NO_SEQ.nextval )
mapper.select: SELECT A.TITLE as TITLE, A.NO as NO, TO_CHAR(A.INSERT_DATE, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi') as INSERT_DATE FROM TBOARD A WHERE A.user_id = #{id} AND A.USE_YN='1'
SELECT A.USER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.INSERT_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as INSERT_DATE FROM TUSER A WHERE A.USER_ID = #{id}
